note.title: About
note.text: Height: Tall Weight: Average Age: Mid Life

note.title: Personality
note.text: Respects nature more than people Once you have my respect, I will protect you for life.

note.title: Ideal
note.text: There are no laws that limit you from doing what is right

note.title: Bonds
note.text: As part of my clan, family is the most important thing to me. I'm willing to take any measure to protect those bonds. Unfortunately, protecting some bonds can mean severing others.

note.title: Flaws
note.text: Through spending my life wandering the wilds, my understanding of technology is slim
